name: Jesus take the wheel (Marco, giacomo scoppola, Fniss, vsong15, Fvg362, Spoonburn)
name_original: Jesus take the wheel (Marco, giacomo scoppola, Fniss, vsong15, Fvg362, Spoonburn)
description:
A drunk man lets his car drive him!

You are the Deus Ex Machina that tries to make order among his mess, making him avoid obstacles and dangers and reach his destination safely!

___________________________________________________________

Controls:

Mouse left click / space - Stop other vehicles

Mouse left click and drag - Move traffic cones away

Esc - Pause game

__________________________________________________________

This game was made with Unity in 48h (effective ~30) for the GMTK 2020 game jam.

Unfortunately the last day a crucial member of our team decided to leave, and that made us loose a lot of time. As a result of that, core mechanic is lacking (vehicles should be also movable) and most of the other intended mechanics didn't make it to the released game.

But still, we didn't give up. Hope you enjoy anyway!

CREDITS

Vincent Song - Programmer

Giacomo Scoppola - 2D artist / animator

Veronica Pardel - 2D artist / animator

Fernando Guedes - Composer / Sound designer

Marco Scutti - Game designer
